page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: My name is Richard. I go to several clubs in the village. On Wednesday I go to the Cub Scouts. It is good fun because as well as learning things we play games such as Chinese Ladders and Tom and Jerry. We also learn how to tie knots. We are given badges to show that we have learned certain useful things like simple cooking, home handyman,cycling efficiency etc. The club lasts from 6.30 to 8.30 pm. I also go to the junior tennis club. I have been a member for three years. I am going to join the bowling club which is next door to the tennis club. My dad is a member. I belong to the school badminton club which is held in our school in the village. This club takes place after school. A teacher coaches us and we compete with other schools.
